origin.fairy.traveling_fairy.name: Traveling Fairy
origin.fairy.traveling_fairy.description: This fairy doesn't have to look for her brother (or sister), but she still loves to travel.
power.fairy.air_miner.name: Air miner
power.fairy.air_miner.description: You break blocks in the air at the same speed as on the ground.
power.fairy.dash.name: Dash
power.fairy.dash.description: Yes, you cannot use fireworks. But who said you can't add a little magic? (This power from Origins++)
power.fairy.fireworks.name: Tinkaboom!
power.fairy.fireworks.description: Trying to use fireworks will immediately blow you up as you are too small to use them. (Power from Adapted Origins)
power.fairy.flying_toggle.name: Like a Bird
power.fairy.flying_toggle.description: Your wings allow you to fly, gradually draining your hunger bar. The ability can be turned off if it interferes with the use of Elytra.
power.fairy.glow.name: Hey, Listen!
power.fairy.glow.description: You can toggle the glow effect on yourself. (Power from Adapted Origins)
power.fairy.leather.name: Too heavy...
power.fairy.leather.description: You cannot wear armor that is stronger than leather.
power.fairy.less_dmg.name: Peaceful
power.fairy.less_dmg.description: It is extremely difficult for you to injure any mob and you will deal 4 times less damage.
power.fairy.low_hp.name: Poor health
power.fairy.magical_agility.name: Magical Agility
power.fairy.magical_agility.description: You will never take damage from falling or landing poorly.
power.fairy.tiny.name: Tiny
power.fairy.tiny.description: You can walk under a half block without crouching.
